CustomField.description: The field is optional and indicates whether a Requirement record has been manually waived. The system automatically sets the Status field on a Requirement record that has not been manually waived if the record does not meet certain criteria. Manually waiving a Requirement record prevents the Status field from being automatically set. Users may manually waive a record by navigating to the checklist and selecting 'Waived' in the user interface.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field indicates whether a Requirement record has been manually waived. The system sets this field automatically if the user sets a Requirement to 'Waived' in the user interface.
CustomField.label: Manually Waived
